Content.Text:
<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Allow me to introduce you to <BLUE>Kamil</BLUE>. He'll be
living in town starting today.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Pleased to meet you. Kamil's the name.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you're a farmer?
<PAGE>
I knew a farmer back in my old hometown.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>The two of us were great friends! Man, those
were some good times.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mr. Kamil is a florist. He mentioned he decided
to move here because of our town's rising
prosperity as a center of trade.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's right. I heard the merchants who pass
through here bring rare flowers from around the
world, so I decided to check it out.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>For now, I'm staying at the <BLUE>inn</BLUE>. If you spot any
rare flowers, I'd be grateful if you let me know.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks. I'm looking forward to it. See you.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, let me show you what's over this
way.
